con:part.con:content:
<wsdl:definitions targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_1" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_1" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:sch4="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:payment-status-update:v1_1" xmlns:sch3="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:sch2="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:sch1="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:sch0="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_1"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:ws:paymentstatusupdate:v1_1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:pref="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:paymentupdate:v1_1" xmlns:pay="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:payment-status-update:v1_1" xmlns:edb="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Operations for updating status of payments. All operations can be performed on message, account, paymentInformation and transcation level. Short explanation of the statuses (see supplementary documentation for further details) Confirm: validated -> toBeApproved | validated -> readyForDueDate (if approval is not used) Approve: toBeApproved -> readyForDueDate | toBeApproved -> partlyApproved (if more than 1 approval needed) Unapprove: readyForDueDate -> toBeApproved Cancel: * -> cancelled Prioritize: readyForDueDate -> readyForDueDate w/priority mark Unprioritize: readyForDueDate w/priority mark -> readyForDueDate Stop: readyForDueDate -> stopped Reactivate: stopped -> readyForDueDate
Error Conditions (responseState.ErrorCode): 70=Technical error (Uncategorized) 6426=No payments found for status update (Validation) 6485=Not authorized for accounts (Validation) 6600=Status update failed for all matching payments. Refer to ResultCode of individual StatusUpdateResults for detailed information
Validation conditions (responseState.ErrorCode) 6601=Status update failed for some matching payments. Refer to ResultCode of individual StatusUpdateResults for detailed information
In case of 6600/6601 the response will include a StatusUpdateResultCode for each payment: SUCCESS=Payment updated successfully UNAUTHORIZED=User not authorized to perform requested operation on payment. ILLEGAL_STATUS_UPDATE=Payment cannot be updated from its current status to the requested status. PARTIALLY_APPROVED=Payment approved successfully, but more approvals are needed to fully approve payment. (This status is only used for paymentApprove). ALREADY_APPROVED_BY_USER=Payment already approved by current user. (This status is only used for paymentApprove). NO_APPROVALS_NEEDED=Customer agreement does not require payment approval. (This status is only used for paymentApprove/Unapprove). AMOUNT_EXCEEDS_AGREED_LIMIT=Payment amount exceeds the approval amount limit on the debit account (This status is only used for paymentApprove).
If no payments matches the requested criteria, an error will be thrown. If at least one payment fulfills the requested criteria, a validation error will be added for each failing payment.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1"/> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:payment-status-update:v1_1"/> <xs:element name="PaymentApproveRequest" type="tns:PaymentApproveRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Approve payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentApproveResponse" type="tns:PaymentApproveResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Resonse from Approve payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentUnapproveRequest" type="tns:PaymentUnapproveRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Unapprove payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentUnapproveResponse" type="tns:PaymentUnapproveResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from Unapprove payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentConfirmRequest" type="tns:PaymentConfirmRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Confirm payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentConfirmResponse" type="tns:PaymentConfirmResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Rsponse from Confirm payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentStopRequest" type="tns:PaymentStopRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Stop payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentStopResponse" type="tns:PaymentStopResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from Stop payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentReactivateRequest" type="tns:PaymentReactivateRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Reactivate payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentReactivateResponse" type="tns:PaymentReactivateResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from Reactivate payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentPrioritizeRequest" type="tns:PaymentPrioritizeRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Prioritize payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentPrioritizeResponse" type="tns:PaymentPrioritizeResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from the Prioritize payment operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentUnprioritizeRequest" type="tns:PaymentUnprioritizeRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Unprioritize payment(s))</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentUnprioritizeResponse" type="tns:PaymentUnprioritizeResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from the Unprioritize payment operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentCancelRequest" type="tns:PaymentCancelRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Cancel payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentCancelResponse" type="tns:PaymentCancelResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from the Cancel payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentHideRequest" type="tns:PaymentHideRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to Hide payment(s)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentHideResponse" type="tns:PaymentHideResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from the Hide payment(s) operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentRemoveFraudFlagRequest" type="tns:PaymentRemoveFraudFlagRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Request to remove fraud flag that has been set on payment. Must be an authorized user</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:element name="PaymentRemoveFraudFlagResponse" type="tns:PaymentRemoveFraudFlagResponseType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Response from the Remove Fraud Flag operation</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:element> <xs:complexType name="PaymentHideRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentHideResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="hideResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentCancelRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentCancelResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="cancelResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentApproveRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentApproveResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approvalInformation" type="pay:PaymentApprovalInformation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="approvalResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentUnapproveRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentUnapproveResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="approvalInformation" type="pay:PaymentApprovalInformation"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="unapprovalResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentConfirmRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentConfirmResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="confirmResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentStopRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentStopResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="stopResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentReactivateRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentReactivateResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="reactivateResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentPrioritizeRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentPrioritizeResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="prioritizeResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentUnprioritizeRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentUnprioritizeResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="unprioritizeResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentRemoveFraudFlagRequestType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:choice> <xs:element name="messageInput" type="pay:MessageStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="accountInput" type="pay:AccountStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoInput" type="pay:PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:element name="transactionInput" type="pay:TransactionStatusUpdateInput"/> </xs:choice> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentRemoveFraudFlagResponseType"> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="edb:baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="removeFraudFlagResult" type="pay:PaymentStatusUpdateResult"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xsd:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"> <xsd:complexType name="ClientContextType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="userid" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the person who initiated the action This could either be the customer itself in a netbank) or an employee</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="credentials" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Authorization data. This is typically a security Object retriewed from a logon, but can also be a plain password.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="channel" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Indicated what type of application that initiated the request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="orgid" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The OrganizationalId - will in a banking context be Financial Institution / Konsernnr</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="orgunit" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The Organizational unit will in a banking context be Branch / Registernr</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="customerid" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Id of the customer on which the operation is requested, may be the same as userid, but may well be different</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="locale" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Locale in a java syntax e.g "en_EN". May be used if application supports localized response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ip" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>The ip adress of the client</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="item" nillable="true" type="itemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optionnal extention items - Add key/value pairs for application specific extentions</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="itemType"> <xsd:attribute name="key" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="EDBHeaderType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="SourceApplication" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the source that initiated the message. Used to separate different service consumers.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="DestinationApplication" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the destination of the message. Used to separate different service providers.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Function" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Identifies the service to be called.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Version" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Service version "X.Y.Z" according to this standard: X = Main release (major changes, not necessarily backwards compatible) Y = Minor release (backwards compatible, new functionality) Z = Bugfix (backwards compatible, error correction only)</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ClientContext" type="ClientContextType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Elements for identifying client context information.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:element name="AutHeader" type="EDBHeaderType"/> <xsd:complexType name="ResponseStateType"> <xsd:sequence> <xsd:element name="ErrorCode" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Numeric error code reported for this error.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Severity" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Response Status Severity Code</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="ComponentId" type="xsd:int"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Unique code identifying the component returning the service response</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="StrErrorCode" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deprecated: Error code represented as String</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element name="Message" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Message describing the error. Default is english language. Optionally localized according to the locale parameter in the service request</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="NativeError" nillable="true" type="xsd:string"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Deprecated: Optional detailed error information reported from involved components. Used for diagnostics purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element minOccurs="0" name="LogSequence" nillable="true" type="xsd:long"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional key generated to be used for log correlation purposes.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> <xsd:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="errorItem" nillable="true" type="errorItemType"> <xsd:annotation> <xsd:documentation>Optional extention items - key/value pairs are used for extented error inforamtion.</xsd:documentation> </xsd:annotation> </xsd:element> </xsd:sequence> </xsd:complexType> <xsd:complexType name="errorItemType"> <xsd:annotation/> <xsd:attribute name="key" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> <xsd:attribute name="value" type="xsd:string" use="required"/> </xsd:complexType> </xsd:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:edbheader="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21" xmlns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:edb-types:v1"> <xs:import namespace="http://edb.com/ws/WSCommon_v21"/> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="baseResponseType"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="ResponseState" type="edbheader:ResponseStateType"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> <xs:schema attributeFormDefault="unqualified" elementFormDefault="qualified" targetNamespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:simpleType name="ISODate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:date"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ISODateTime"> <xs:restriction base="xs:dateTime"/> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Max15NumericText"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[0-9]{1,15}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="DecimalNumber"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="17"/> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BaseOneRate"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="10"/> <xs:totalDigits value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="5"/> <xs:totalDigits value="18"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="Amount_SimpleType_NoFractions"> <xs:restriction base="xs:decimal"> <xs:fractionDigits value="0"/> <xs:totalDigits value="12"/> <xs:minInclusive value="0"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ChargeBearerTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DEBT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="CRED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>All transaction charges are to be borne by the creditor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SHAR"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>In a credit transfer context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the debtor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the creditor. In a direct debit context, means that transaction charges on the sender side are to be borne by the creditor, transaction charges on the receiver side are to be borne by the debtor.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="SLEV"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Charges are to be applied following the rules agreed in the service level and/or scheme.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PriorityCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="HIGH"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority level is high.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NORM"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Priority level is normal.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="BICFIIdentifier"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{6,6}[A-Z2-9][A-NP-Z0-9]([A-Z0-9]{3,3}){0,1}"/> <xs:minLength value="8"/> <xs:maxLength value="11"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="ActiveOrHistoricCurrencyCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{3,3}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="CountryCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:pattern value="[A-Z]{2,2}"/> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:simpleType name="PaymentTypeCode"> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_HIGH_VALUE_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CURRENCY_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_HIGH_VALUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_HIGH_VALUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_TRANSFER</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CHEQUE_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CHEQUE_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="DOMESTIC_CHEQUE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>DOMESTIC_CHEQUE</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_PAYMENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_URGENT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER_URGENT</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="INTERNATIONAL_TRANSFER"> <xs:annotation> xmlns:st="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"> <xs:import namespace="urn:pays.payment.edb.com:domain:sepa-simple-types:v1"/> <xs:complexType abstract="true" name="BaseStatusUpdateInput"/> <xs:complexType name="MessageStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Updates all payments within specified messages</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="messageId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentInfoStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Updates specified payment infos</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="paymentInfoId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="TransactionStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Updates specified transaction ids</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="transactionId" type="xs:long"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="AccountStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Updates specified payments with specified debtor accounts within a message</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:complexContent> <xs:extension base="tns:BaseStatusUpdateInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="messageId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="accountIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:extension> </xs:complexContent> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentApprovalInformation"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Information about payment approval.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="numberOfTransactions" type="tns:NumberOfTransactions"/> <xs:element name="controlSum" type="st:DecimalNumber"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="NumberOfTransactions"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="numberOfTransactions" type="st:Max15NumericText"/> <xs:element name="paymentType" type="st:PaymentTypeCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="PaymentStatusUpdateResult"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>The result from a payment status update for a specific payment transaction.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="messageId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="paymentInfoId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="transactionId" type="xs:long"/> <xs:element name="result" type="tns:StatusUpdateResultCode"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="StatusUpdateResultCode"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates whether a specific payment was sucessfully updated and, the reason for failure if unsuccesful.</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="SUCCESS"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment updated successfully</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="UNAUTHORIZED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>User not authorized to perform requested operation on payment</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ILLEGAL_STATUS_UPDATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment cannot be updated from its current status to the requested status</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="PARTIALLY_APPROVED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment approved successfully, but more approvals are needed to fully approve payment. (This status is only used for paymentApprove)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="ALREADY_APPROVED_BY_USER"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment already approved by current user. (This status is only used for paymentApprove)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="NO_APPROVALS_NEEDED"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Customer agreement does not require payment approval. (This status is only used for paymentApprove/unapprove)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="AMOUNT_EXCEEDS_AGREED_LIMIT"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment amount exceeds the approval amount limit on the debit account (This status is only used for paymentApprove)</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> </xs:restriction> </xs:simpleType> <xs:complexType name="StatusUpdateRequestType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>This is a common type for payment(s) status update</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="statusUpdateType" type="tns:StatusUpdateEnumType"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" minOccurs="0" name="accountIdentification" type="st:Max35Text"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:simpleType name="StatusUpdateEnumType"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Indicates the ENUM type for Id Types</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> <xs:restriction base="xs:string"> <xs:enumeration value="PAYMENT_INFO_STATUS_UPDATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Payment Info Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="MESSAGE_STATUS_UPDATE"> <xs:annotation> <xs:documentation>Message Type</xs:documentation> </xs:annotation> </xs:enumeration> <xs:enumeration value="TRANSACTION_STATUS_UPDATE"> <xs:annotation>
